channel.title: Tel Aviv Summit 2019 on Dudu Twizer's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Tel Aviv Summit 2019 on Dudu Twizer's Site

item.title: Blur the Boundaries between Your on-Premises to AWS Cloud
item.description: So, you have workloads running on premises and you wish to extend to the Cloud? You are not that different! Let’s discuss few of your options for running in a hybrid mode. How to connect the two in a secure manner? Which services you should utilize? what you can also use on premises?
